changeSet.author: mstead
changeSet.comment: Round 3 of ueber data cleanup. The assumption that a Pool would never exist without its corresponding Product was incorrect. The combonation of customer work-arounds and the concurrency issues while generating ueber certs allow for Pools without its Products. The existing cleanup queries miss this case. This new changeset will use the Pool.productname for the query comparisons so that they will not be missed.
